channel.title: Engi Village recruiting for the IM
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Engi Village recruiting for the IM" - Come get your StI!

item.title: Engi Village recruiting for the IM
item.content:encoded:
Engi Village is a few days away from being IM-ready. The only things I still need areâ€¦
1) Three more kaiju upgrades (two more after today; we're enticing as fast as we can to get through this part)
2) Fifty villagers.

The first part will go by quickly, even if we hit some of the 20k HP kaiju; despite being a village that's a bit less than only five months old, we've raised it from scratch to near-IM status and can dish out ~10k kaiju damage a day. The second part is where you can send a character on over to get a Survived the Impossible to make your Wasteland Trips a bit easier, while snagging an extra crank level and more daily stamina.

Applications will be accepted as soon as I see them :)

UPDATE: We're at 40 villagers now, only ~10 more to go.
UPDATE2: 45 villagers, almost there!
UPDATE3: THE IM IS UNDERWAY
